main_text.sentence: Phylogenetic trees were constructed using maximum parsimony (MP): implemented in PHYLIP [61] using ProtPars, Neighbour-joining (NJ): implemented in PHYLIP using ProtDist and Neighbour and maximum likelihood (ML): implemented in Tree-Puzzle [62].
HC and PAM methods were implemented using the statistical package R [22], while CAST and SA were implemented locally in C++.
The GOLD.db was implemented in Java technology [4].
In 1997 this still had not been implemented [57].
[4] and implemented in Alternative Splicing Gallery (ASG) [10].
Such a format has been implemented in GenProtEC [16].
